ch0048_00_gima/0101_0701_01_10:
I’ve got a good feeling about today.
Luck seems to be in my favor whenever
you’re around, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0048_00_gima/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m getting antsy just thinking about all the battles
that await us today.
ch0048_00_gima/0601_0701_01_10:
One of my comrades back home is a
Pokémon called Bisharp, a species native
to the Unova region.
ch0048_00_gima/0601_0701_02_10:
Bisharp’s body is protected by steel armor, and it
has a fondness for slicing into whatever it sees.
ch0048_00_gima/0601_0701_03_10:
It glides through the battlefield regally,
like shuffling a deck of cards.
ch0048_00_gima/0601_0701_04_10:
The way it seems to own the battle with its
charm has made it one of my favorite Pokémon
to battle with.
ch0048_00_gima/0601_0702_01_10:
I hope someday you, too, will discover a Pokémon
that draws your gaze with its beauty and charm
in battle.
ch0048_00_gima/0601_0702_02_10:
When you do, I have a feeling you’ll develop a
new thirst for victory within you as well.
ch0048_00_gima/0602_0701_01_10: I’m fond of a great many Pokémon...
ch0048_00_gima/0602_0701_02_10: but it’s Liepard’s strength that I’d risk it all on.
ch0048_00_gima/0602_0701_03_10:
The way she pounces with devastating blows
faster than her opponents can predict them...
ch0048_00_gima/0602_0701_04_10:
Sure, there’s always some manner of luck
involved—but that just adds to the flavor.
ch0048_00_gima/0602_0702_01_10:
When you find a Pokémon that you adore, go out
on a limb for it—take risks.
ch0048_00_gima/0602_0702_02_10:
When you crave victory for your Pokémon,
that desire feeds into your Pokémon’s strength.
ch0048_00_gima/0603_0701_01_10:
It’s plain to see that every Trainer here on Pasio
has a thirst for battle—myself among them.
ch0048_00_gima/0603_0701_02_10: I, too, wish to revel in the joy of Pokémon battling.
ch0048_00_gima/0603_0701_03_10:
I wonder... Who do you think will rise to the top
and claim victory here on Pasio?
ch0048_00_gima/0603_0701_04_10:
I suppose that’s a foolish question—the natural
response of any Trainer would be themselves,
of course.
ch0048_00_gima/0603_0702_01_10:
If I had to wager a guess at who lady luck favors
most, besides myself...
ch0048_00_gima/0603_0702_02_10:
well, I suppose I’d wager on you—hypothetically,
of course. You have potential. I see great things in
your future.
ch0048_00_gima/0603_0702_03_10:
Why not cast your lot with me, and we can claim
victory together?
ch0048_00_gima/0604_0701_01_10:
In a Pokémon battle, we seek victory—
never defeat.
ch0048_00_gima/0604_0701_02_10:
For us, battling with our Pokémon is a way to
satisfy our desire to win—to get what we want.
ch0048_00_gima/0604_0701_03_10:
I don’t let myself get distracted by losses or grow
bigheaded when victorious—I simply seek to win
my next battle.
ch0048_00_gima/0604_0701_04_10:
That is my pure and honest desire, and I have no
need to hesitate.
ch0048_00_gima/0604_0702_01_10: It’s not wrong to thirst for battle.
ch0048_00_gima/0604_0702_02_10:
A pure, true desire to win has the power to
change one’s fate, despite the inevitable losses
one must sometimes face.
ch0048_00_gima/0604_0702_03_10:
When the time comes for you to face adversity,
I wonder how the cards will fall.
ch0048_00_gima/0605_0701_02_10:
I love Pokémon more than anything else in the
world, as all Trainers do...
ch0048_00_gima/0605_0701_03_10: but let me get one thing off my chest.
ch0048_00_gima/0605_0701_04_10:
Battles can be used to settle a lot of
different things.
ch0048_00_gima/0605_0701_05_10:
However, battling others just to profess that your
love is better than theirs... That’s just deplorable.
ch0048_00_gima/0605_0702_01_10:
Telling someone that their feelings are wrong—or
getting in the way of someone else’s love—is not
a nice thing to do.
ch0048_00_gima/0605_0702_02_10:
When it comes to loving your Pokémon, everyone
can be a champion.
ch0048_00_gima/1701_0701_01_10:
Ah, looks like I caught you at just the right time.
I have something for you.
ch0048_00_gima/1701_0701_02_10: Here, don’t be shy. May it serve you well.
ch0048_00_gima/1701_0702_01_10: If you want more, you’ll have to fend for yourself.
ch0048_00_gima/2501_0701_01_10:
The Pokémon you choose, the moves they use, and
the Trainers you team up with...
ch0048_00_gima/2501_0701_02_10:
are all impeccable choices, the way I see it. You
know how it feels to thirst for victory and triumph.
ch0048_00_gima/2501_0701_03_10:
From my perspective, it looks like you still have
some room to grow when it comes to following
through on the battlefield...
ch0048_00_gima/2501_0701_04_10:
but if that’s just your playfulness that I’m seeing,
then perhaps I’m wrong.
ch0048_00_gima/2501_0702_01_10:
After all, having a thirst for victory is not a bad
thing in and of itself...
ch0048_00_gima/2501_0702_02_10:
but if you can afford to have some fun along
the way, it should be encouraged.
ch0048_00_gima/2501_0702_03_10:
A bit of adventurousness can be the ace up your
sleeve, you know. I can appreciate that in a
battle opponent.
ch0048_00_gima/2511_0701_01_10:
Highly competitive Trainers don’t tend to
flock together.
ch0048_00_gima/2511_0701_02_10:
You see, the strongest Trainers know they’ll
eventually have to face one another, and that
doesn’t lend itself to chummy teamwork.
ch0048_00_gima/2511_0701_03_10:
That being said, teaming up with you and
claiming victory together versus individually...
That has its own brilliant shine.
ch0048_00_gima/2511_0701_04_10: I want to experience more of that shine.
ch0048_00_gima/2511_0702_01_10:
Being a Pokémon Trainer isn’t something you can
do alone.
ch0048_00_gima/2511_0702_02_10:
You always have your Pokémon fighting
there beside you. You can’t have a real
battle otherwise.
ch0048_00_gima/2511_0702_03_10:
In order to win, you have to be able to trust your
Pokémon and your Pokémon has to have faith
in you.
ch0048_00_gima/2511_0702_04_10:
The Trainers who possess the strongest trust are
the ones who will win—particularly here on Pasio
with this many Trainers competing.
ch0048_00_gima/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. Something tells me luck’s on our
side today.
ch0048_00_gima/3002_0701_01_10:
I’m not really a morning person...
I tend to stay up late battling most nights.
ch0048_00_gima/3003_0701_01_10:
Eating a proper meal should be your first step to
prepare for battle.
ch0048_00_gima/3004_0701_01_10:
I study new moves during the day—and then
battle with them at night. That’s my style.
ch0048_00_gima/3005_0701_01_10:
Dark nights are for daredevils like me.
Are you a daredevil, too?
ch0048_00_gima/3006_0701_01_10:
Some people say nights are calm and relaxing,
but for a thrill-seeker like me, they get the
blood pumping.
